TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit Label extends System.ValueType

Docs.summary: Represents a label in the instruction stream. `Label` is used in conjunction with the <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator"> class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool Equals(object obj) cil managed

Docs.param: The object to compare with this `Label` instance.
Docs.summary: Checks if the given object is an instance of `Label` and is equal to this instance.
Docs.returns: Returns `true` if is an instance of `Label` and is equal to this object; otherwise, `false`.
